title: A Touch of Strange
description: 'Winner of both Hugo and Nebula Awards, Theodore Sturgeon has established his reputation as one of the most original and provocative of SF writers. Here are nine masterpieces of imagination from the period of his finest creativity. Included are "The Pod in the Barrier", "The Other Celia", Affair with a Green Monkey", "The Touch of Your Hand", and more. The name of Theodore Sturgeon is a magic word in the field of science fiction and fantasy - and A TOUCH OF STRANGE is one of his most unforgettable collections.' [From back cover.]
author: Theodore Sturgeon
